title: Gilmore Girls Characters
description: How well do you know the residents of Stars Hollow?

questions.question: Who runs the local inn before Lorelai opens the Dragonfly?
questions.explanation: Mia owns the Independence Inn where Lorelai worked her way up from maid to manager.

questions.question: What is Sookie's profession?
questions.explanation: Sookie St. James is a talented but accident-prone chef and Lorelai's best friend.

questions.question: Kirk has held numerous different jobs throughout the series.
questions.explanation: Kirk Gleason is famous for having held dozens of bizarre jobs in Stars Hollow throughout the series!

questions.question: What is the name of Luke's nephew?
questions.explanation: Jess Mariano is Luke's rebellious nephew who comes to live with him in Stars Hollow.

questions.question: Who is Paris Geller?

options.text: Rory's rival turned friend at Chilton

questions.explanation: Paris starts as Rory's intense academic rival at Chilton but becomes one of her closest friends.

questions.question: What is Michel's nationality?
questions.explanation: Michel Gerard is the snooty French concierge at the Independence Inn and later the Dragonfly.

questions.question: Lane Kim's mother owns a furniture store.
questions.explanation: Mrs. Kim owns an antique store, not a furniture store, and is very strict with Lane.

questions.question: Who is the town selectman obsessed with town events?
questions.explanation: Taylor Doose is the uptight town selectman who runs the market and organizes all town events.
